group_1.textLeft: *Siiiiigh*...I'm super tired...

group_1.textRight: Himenaâ€”@*Gasp*!
[chara:102901:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!
That smell...

group_1.textLeft: Ahh, it's still there?
My uniform got a bit stained. My momma's@totally gonna kill me.
[chara:102801:effect_emotion_sad_0][se:7224_fall_into]God, what a mess...

group_1.textRight: Um, did you go...to the sewers...?

group_1.textLeft: Duh, that's a no-brainer.
Both of you ran off, so...
Who else was gonna do it?

group_1.textRight: Oh...

group_1.textLeft: I found a Witch, but not the one we're looking@for, so the whole thing really sucked...
So... There's something you wanna talk about,@right?

group_1.textRight: Oh, umm...yeah...

group_1.textLeft: About why you hate cute lil' me?

group_1.textRight: .........[wait:0.8][chara:102901:lipSynch_1]Yeah.

group_1.textLeft: It's fine, I can take it. I'm not gonna flip out.
Whatever you wanna say to me, just lay it on me.

group_1.textRight: I don't recognize you as our leader...!
You just suddenly took control of the Neo-Magius...
And I'm not just some convenient pawn...!

group_1.textLeft: And...?

group_1.textRight: You're just going to throw us away when you@reach the top, aren't you...?
Do you even care about the supremacy of@Magical Girls...?!
Magical Girls never get any respect, so...
And plus, we could've teamed up with those@Magical Girls yesterday...

group_1.textLeft: Well, when I suddenly declared myself a leader@to climb to the top...
I'm sure you two were really surprised.
But if you had turned me down, wouldn't you@guys have been screwed anyway?
Besides, my bae says you gotta put the right@people in the right place to get the job done.
I'll get my hands dirty if I have to, just like today.

group_1.textRight: .........[wait:0.8][chara:102901:lipSynch_1]Yeah.

group_1.textLeft: After all, if I don't come up with any plans for us...
Aren't you two just gonna run around like@headless chickens?

group_1.textRight: Hey, that's not true...!

group_1.textLeft: 'Kay then, got any suggestions you wanna@throw out there?
And the reason why I rejected those girls@is because...
The instructor wants to test how well@the three of us work together.
So it's important to deal with this problem on@our own.
But what if you won't even contribute brains@OR brawn?
Then we'll never pass. None of this crap about@"trust" or whatever makes any difference.
What, are you playing some dark, misunderstood@character with a persecution complex?

group_1.textRight: Himena...!

group_1.textLeft: Ahhh... My bad, I went too far...

group_1.textRight: Th-that's not it! You should have realized@you've been in the wrong, too...!
We can't just agree if you suddenly declare@yourself our leader...
And I don't think you express your thoughts@very often...
It's not as if we can read your mind...!

group_1.textLeft: ...Yeah, you're right.
Sorry, Shigurin, Hagurin. I didn't consider@how you two felt...
Truth is, I wanted to apologize right away and@be friends with you...
I'm not kidding you, I think we're a lot alike...

group_1.textRight: *Sniff*...

group_1.textLeft: So, believe me when I say this...
I won't ever badmouth you just because@you've got a gloomy personality.
If I did, I'd be betraying him...
My bae...

group_1.textRight: *Sniff*...what do you mean...?

group_1.textLeft: Well, I don't want to smell, so why don't we@go for a bath...?

group_1.textRight: Huh...?

group_1.textLeft: I found a bathhouse nearby. Let's talk about it@there.
Like the reason why I wanna come out on top in@the fight for [textYellow:Kimochi] stones.
There's a lot I wanna tell you...
